register.title: Register
register.acceptTermCondition: By registering, you agree to our {term}, {privacyPolicy} {cookies}.
register.enterAuthCodeEmail: A {verifyCode} is sent to your email address To verify your email address, enter it below.
register.enterAuthCodeEmailAccountInform: Please enter the {authCode} provided in the email to verify your email address.
register.enterAuthCodePhone: Please enter the {verifyCode} provided in the SMS to verify your Phone number.
register.enterAuthCodePhoneAccountInform: Please enter the {authCode} provided in the SMS to verify your Phone number.
register.alertPhoneArea: You cannot register with a phone number other than China phone number (+86).

label.otp: for those who have forgotten their password

home.title: Home
home.information: Your tax refund request will be automatically processed once you have completed the following {threeSteps}
home.informationComplete: Once you complete the following {threeSteps}, your tax refund application will begin automatically.
home.declaimerComplete: Please note that even after you have completed the preparations, an {image} alert will be displayed on the home screen until the system is updated. The review process takes about 24 hours on average.
home.declaimer: An indicator {image} will be displayed on the home screen even after you have completed all the pre-requisite data. The review process will approximately take about 24 hours before the system is updated.
home.pleaseTakeAPhoto: Please take a photo of your passport and register it. All information will be filled in automatically.
home.ifTakePhotoError: If the automatically entered information is incorrect, please correct it manually.
home.registrationCompleteWord: Once your passport registration is complete, the face recognition button will appear under your passport photo. Take a photo of your face and register it.
home.refundDeclaimer: Please register at least one method for receiving your refund: credit card, bank account, or cashless service.
home.enjoyJapanRefundService: Unlock a better Japan experience with JPrefund, the seamless and hassle-free tax refund service
home.youMustLoggedIn: To request a refund, you need to log in
home.receiptCantBeRegister: This receipt cannot be registered because it has already been authenticated by another user.
home.disableItemNotification: Your record(s) has been invalidated because it has been authenticated by another user.
home.receiptHaveBeenAuthenticated: Your account has been validated. Your tax refund request will be processed accordingly

scan.title: Scan
scan.qrAlert: If you cannot read the QR code Please enter the transaction number manually

passportInformation.title: Identity Authentication
passportInformation.takePortraitInstruction: Taking a photo in a bright location with a simple background is recommended
passportInformation.pleaseTakePhoto: Please take a photo of your passport and register it. All information will be filled in automatically.
passportInformation.ifTheAutomaticallyIsIncorrect: If the automatically entered information is incorrect, please correct it manually.
passportInformation.oneYourPassportIsComplete: Once your passport registration is complete, the face recognition button will appear under your passport photo.
passportInformation.takePhotoAndRegisterIt: Take a photo of your face and register it.
passportInformation.afterRegisteringYourPassport: After registering your passport, please take a selfie to verify your face.
passportInformation.successInfo: Your changes have been saved successfully
passportInformation.actionFailedInfo: Incomplete fields, please fill in all information
passportInformation.photoInstruction: Ensure that the phone is aligned parallelly with the passport orientation.
passportInformation.pleaseTakeAPhoto: Please take a photo of your passport's profile. The passport information you take will be displayed automatically. Please manually correct the wrong information.

note.head: NOTE
note.inform: You will not be able to receive a refund unless you take a clear photo.
note.1: Ensure you scan the entire passport page without any parts missing/cut out.
note.2: Ensure that the phone is aligned parallelly with the passport orientation.
note.3: Ensure that you have enough light and there is no reflection.

notifSend.1: We will begin your passport application.
notifSend.3: 1. All the information listed are the same information listed within your passport
notifSend.4: 2. After passport submitted you will not be able to change the information
notifSend.5: This process took 24 hours on average.

passportInformation.problemMessage3: Your facial recognition photo is unclear.
passportInformation.informationDeficiency: There is an error in your passport information. Please check the details and submit again.
passportInformation.blurredPassportPhoto: Your passport photo is unclear. Please take a new passport photo.
passportInformation.faceRecognitionPhotoIsUnclear: The facial recognition photo is unclear. Please take a new facial recognition photo.
passportInformation.facesDontMatch: Your passport photo and facial recognition photo do not match. Please check.

contactDetails.title: Contact Information
contactDetails.uploadDocumentInstruction: Upload a document that proves your permanent residence: permit, visa If your permanent address is in a different tax jurisdiction than your passport country, please provide a residence certificate. Example: I have an EU passport but live outside the EU.
contactDetails.either: Enter either your email address or phone number
contactDetails.scanCertificateInstruction: In good light, a plain background will make the text and photos stand out clearly, making your ID stand out.
contactDetails.not-complete: Your contact information is not complete

accountInformation.title: Account Information
accountInformation.askForDeletion: Do you want to delete the following account?
accountInformation.ifYouDelete: If you delete your account, you will no longer be able to log in or use JPrefund services with that account.
accountInformation.ifYouWishToReregister: If you wish to re-register after deleting your account, you will need to register as a new account. Previous data and settings cannot be carried over.
accountInformation.toEnsureTheSafe: To ensure the safe deletion of your account, you will be asked to authenticate by entering your password.
accountInformation.enterPassword: Please enter your password to delete your account. This action is irreversible.
accountInformation.doYouReallyWantToDelete: Do you really want to delete the account "example@mail.com"?
accountInformation.warningDelete: Deleting your account will remove your personal information from our system. Your email will be permanently recorded in our system. Hence, the same email can not be registered as a new account.
accountInformation.ensureYou: Ensure you understand by deleting your account, you will no longer be able to log in or use JPrefund services with your account.
accountInformation.youNeedRegister: You need to register a new account in order to use JPrefund services again, however your previous settings and information will not be carried over.

detail.title: Purchase Details
detail.unsuccessInform: We regret to inform you that your refund request was unsuccessful If you believe we have made a mistake, please reach out to our Administrator or try again with different refund method or account.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.resetByEmail: An email with a link to reset your password will be sent to your registered email address.
resetPassword.resetByPhone: A text message with a link to reset your password will be sent to your registered phone number.
resetPassword.resetInform: Your password has now been reset. Please continue to use our services.
resetPassword.resetEmailSendToYou: A reset email has been sent to you
resetPassword.resetSmsSendToYou: SMS has been sent to your mobile phone
resetPassword.clickOnUrlInEmail: Follow the instruction within your email to reset your password.
resetPassword.clickOnUrlInSms: Follow the instruction within your SMS to reset your password.
resetPassword.expiresUrl: The URL will expires in 24 hours.

emailInstruction.head: If you have a problem receiving the email, please check the following conditions:
emailInstruction.1: You have inputted the correct email address.
emailInstruction.2: Your email address is capable receiving emails from “jprefund.com”.
emailInstruction.3: ou have already checked your spam folder.
emailInstruction.foot: If the problem persist, let us know by sending an email to example@jprefund.com

smsInstruction.head: If you have a problem receiving the SMS, please check the following conditions:
smsInstruction.1: You have inputted the correct phone number.
smsInstruction.3: Your phone is capable of receiving SMS.
smsInstruction.foot: If the problem persist, let us know by sending an email to example@jprefund.com

refundMethod.title: Refund Methods
refundMethod.deleteConfirmation: Would you like to delete your refund method of {name}?
refundMethod.changeConfirmation: Would you like to change your refund method to this {name} service?

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content1: At Refund Tax Company, we prioritize the confidentiality and security of your personal information. Our privacy policy ensures that any data shared with us during the refund process is treated with the utmost care and is strictly utilized for the purpose of facilitating tax-related services.
privacyPolicy.content2: We commit to safeguarding your sensitive details, adhering to industry-standard encryption practices, and maintaining strict internal protocols to protect your privacy. Additionally, any financial transactions or refund-related information will be handled securely and in compliance with relevant legal regulations.
privacyPolicy.content3: Our commitment to transparency and privacy underscores our dedication to providing you with a trusted and secure environment for all your tax refund needs.

userTerms.title: User Terms
userTerms.content1: User Agreement Welcome to Refund Gate! By accessing or using our website (www.refundgate.com) and any related services (collectively referred to as the "Service"), you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions ("User Agreement"). Please read these terms carefully before accessing or using the Service. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.
userTerms.content2: Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by this User Agreement, as well as any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific sections of the Service.
userTerms.content3: Eligibility You must be at least 18 years old to access or use the Service. By accessing or using the Service, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into this User Agreement
userTerms.content4: User Accounts To access certain features of the Service, you may be required to create a user account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating your account and to keep your password secure. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
userTerms.content5: Privacy Policy Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information. By using the Service, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in the Privacy Policy.
userTerms.content6: Intellectual Property All content included on the Service, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of Refund Gate or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright laws and international treaties.
userTerms.content7: Prohibited Conduct You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities: Use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion or feature of the Service. Interfere with or disrupt the operation of the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service. Impersonate any person or entity or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity. Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
userTerms.content8: Disclaimer of Warranties The Service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without any representations or warranties, express or implied. Refund Gate does not warrant that the Service will be error-free or uninterrupted.
userTerms.content9: Limitation of Liability In no event shall Refund Gate be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the Service.
userTerms.content10: Governing Law This User Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
userTerms.content11: Changes to Terms Refund Gate reserves the right to modify or replace any part of this User Agreement at any time. It is your responsibility to check this User Agreement periodically for changes. Your continued use of the Service following the posting of any changes to this User Agreement constitutes acceptance of those changes.
